title: Projects
description: A showcase of my recent work and projects

projects.title: Velocity
projects.description: Developing a comprehensive property management and real estate solutions platform featuring property listings, tenant management, maintenance tracking, and financial analytics for streamlined property operations.
highlights: Advanced property listing and search system

projects.title: CineSaga
projects.description: Developing a comprehensive OTT (Over-The-Top) streaming platform featuring movie and series streaming, user subscriptions, content management, and personalized recommendations for seamless entertainment experiences.
highlights: Advanced video streaming and content delivery system
Personalized content recommendations and user profiles
Multi-device streaming support and offline downloads

projects.title: FreeTheMarket
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive rideshare platform featuring driver-rider matching, real-time tracking, fare calculation, payment processing, and route optimization for seamless transportation experiences.
highlights: Real-time GPS tracking and route optimization
Secure payment processing and fare calculation

projects.title: TripZinga
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive travel planning and management platform featuring trip organization, expense tracking, points management, and community features for seamless travel experiences.
highlights: Comprehensive trip planning and itinerary management
Advanced expense tracking with visual analytics
Community forum for travel tips and advice

projects.title: MailGoblin
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive email marketing and automation platform featuring campaign management, subscriber analytics, template builder, and automated workflow systems for businesses.

projects.title: Reboundate
projects.description: Designed and implemented a secure and scalable dating app featuring user authentication, intelligent swiping and matching algorithms, and real-time messaging.

projects.title: CrewResume
projects.description: Developed and implemented the backend infrastructure of a comprehensive job searching portal focused on resume management and candidate screening.

projects.title: Brodough
projects.description: Designed and developed a feature-rich fantasy gaming application with dynamic gameplay mechanics, advanced social features, and performance optimization.
